thread.title_full: California Golden Bears vs. Utah Utes Pick Prediction NCAA College Football Point Spread Over Under Money Line Betting Odds Preview 10-10-2015

author: Tony Tellez
title: California Golden Bears vs. Utah Utes Pick Prediction NCAA College Football Point Spread Over Under Money Line Betting Odds Preview 10-10-2015
text:
Point Spread Odds: Utah -7 
Over Under Total: 61 1/2 
Money Line: Utah -305 odds with California +245 odds. 
Notes: These teams last met in 2012 with Utah posting the 49-27 home victory to Cal as a -1 ½ point wagering favorite. California is 5-0 on the season following the 34-28 home victory last week to the Washington St Cougars as a -16 ½ point wagering favorite. The total went under 73 ½ points. It was a nice passing game by Golden Bears quarterback Jared Goff who hit on 33 of 45 passes for 390 yards with four touchdowns and a pick. They benefitted from a +2 turnover margin. Cal is seventh best in scoring offense by pushing across 43.4 points a game. 
Utah enters play off a bye week. The team is 4-0 after the 62-20 road victory to the Oregon Ducks as a +10 ½ point wagering underdog. The total went over 63 ½ points. The Utes offense rolled up 530 yards of offense at Oregon with quarterback Travis Wilson passing for 227 yards with four touchdowns. The Utes benefited from a +3 turnover margin. Utah is ranks 20th in scoring offense by averaging 38.8 points a game. 
California Golden Bears versus Utah Utes Free Pick : This college football
